t: About Import Fees Deposit - Amazon Customer Service
s: When you order products for shipment to destinations outside of the U.S., or for shipment into the U.S. from another destination, we facilitate customs clearance on your behalf. You will see "Import Fees Deposit" or "Import Charges" at checkout, depending on your destination.

s: Hi, sir! amazon's Import Fees Deposit is merely an estimate and would be used by the carrier towards PH customs fees/taxes. If that estimate turns out to be low, then you as the importer have to coordinate with the carrier and pony up the balance.
